channel.title: Microcontroller, Systems Design on Pranavi Boyalakuntla
channel.description: Recent content in Microcontroller, Systems Design on Pranavi Boyalakuntla

item.title: Game Controller Design
item.description: With the rising popularity of lifestyle video games and lack of game consoles on the market during this pandemic, I created a USB powered game controller that could interface with the popular game: Stardew Valley. This project was made as a part of a project-based microcontrollers class offered in the fall of 2020. This was a semester long class where I exercised and grew my skills in KiCAD to iteratively design schematics, layout PCBs, electrical and firmware system design, and part sourcing.
